typeSystemDescription.name: Note_TableProperties
typeSystemDescription.description: Reference page: https://github.com/OHDSI/CommonDataModel/wiki/NOTE OMOP Common Data Model v6.0 Specifications 11October2018

typeDescription.name: edu.musc.tbic.omop_cdm.Note_TableProperties
typeDescription.description: A datastructure for storing all the properties associated with a note in the NOTE table

featureDescription.name: note_id
featureDescription.description: A unique identifier for each note.

featureDescription.name: person_id
featureDescription.description: A foreign key identifier to the Person about whom the Note was recorded. The demographic details of that Person are stored in the PERSON table.

featureDescription.name: note_date
featureDescription.description: The date the note was recorded.

featureDescription.name: note_datetime
featureDescription.description: The date and time the note was recorded.

featureDescription.name: note_source_value
featureDescription.description: The source value associated with the origin of the Note - varchar(50)
